summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the improvement of 21st AVENUE SOUTHWEST, et al, by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same as authorized by Ordinance No. 104715, creating Local Improvement District No. 6658; eliminating therefor the construction of sanitary sewers in a portion of 23rd Avenue Southwest and in easements between 23rd Avenue Southwest and Delridge Way Southwest north of Southwest Alaska Street; and amending Section I and Section 3 of said ordinance.
